column4: Hello!  I've been having some problems with playing dvd's on ubuntu fiesty on my thinkpad t61.  DVDCSS isn't decrypting the disks properly.  Does anyone know what is going on?  The error is "libdvdread: Error cracking CSS key for /VIDEO_TS/VIDEO_TS.VOB (0x000002a0)"
I appreciate the link, put I've followed that tutorial to a tee
